title: Meta Ray-Ban Smart Glasses 2026: Full Heads-Up Display & Live Translation Coming
shortdescription: Mark Zuckerberg confirms next-gen Ray-Bans will have actual AR display built into lenses.
author: Tech Expert

content.content: Mark Zuckerberg just confirmed: the 2026 Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses will have a full micro-OLED heads-up display built into the lenses — turning regular sunglasses into lightweight AR glasses.
Features include live translation in 50 languages, navigation overlays, Meta AI visual search, and control via a neural wristband. Price expected around $499 — a fraction of Vision Pro.
